metadata.title: CVE-2023-1098 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability has been discovered in GitLab EE/CEaffecting all versions starting from 11.5 before 15.8.5, all versionsstarting from 15.9 before 15.9.4, all versions starting from 15.10 before15.10.1 will allow an admin to leak password from repository mirrorconfiguration.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
